reviews.review_text:
Amazing Experience at Sakana!

We had a delightful dinner at Sakana, and everything about this place was perfect. The soft and sweet music created an incredible ambiance‚Äîa perfect Goa welcome.

The staff was exceptionally helpful, guiding us through the menu with suggestions that were spot on. They even recommended visiting a fantastic new bar called JUNA after dinner, which turned out to be a great tip!

The freshness of the dishes truly stood out, leaving us humbled and craving more. Every bite was a testament to the care and quality they put into their food.

Highly recommend Sakana for anyone looking for a memorable dining experience in Goa. We‚Äôll definitely be coming back!

The ideal setting for enjoying sushi, especially during the rainy season when the outdoors are particularly captivating. The overall ambiance strikes a perfect balance, neither too hot nor too cold, ensuring a pleasant dining experience. If you're a fan of delicious Tempura üç§, you'll definitely appreciate it here. The service is outstanding, with incredibly friendly and helpful staff who offer suggestions and guidance if you're having trouble deciding on a starter. The restaurant is well-maintained and spotlessly clean, adding to the overall inviting atmosphere that it exudes.

The first time I tried Japanese cuisine it was great.
The food was tasty, well served, not much waiting time.
Salmon sushi was tasty, fresh and well served.
Cocktails also were great, I had a great experience having dinner here.

Most of the foreigners are visiting here.
Some times getting a seat is also lucky.

The management is also very service minded, how they are treating the guests was great, Very friendly.

Ambience looks good and attractive.
